name: MindSwipe
description:
Hypnotic, mind-bending puzzle game for iPhone, iPad, and Apple Watch!

Mix and match languages, including: English, Spanish, French, and Hebrew.
Swipe to solve puzzles. 
Learn as you go.

No in-app purchase. 
Simple straightforward paid app.

Soundtrack by RONARI
Apple Music: https://music.apple.com/us/artist/ronari/1473866888
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/artist/0EfqZD5G02uqxSwCt1nBpr?si=MViOQeH4RFCYYuL2riWn4w

Thanks to
Swift Algorithms
https://github.com/apple/swift-algorithms
